name: Alunar
description:
Description:

Alunar is a third person adventure game focused on exploration with some horror elements.
In prealpha demo you can explore the map to discover all 11 interactions. Most of them are scattered in the starting base and its surrounding area.

Story:
Something is happening on the moon. You are the only researcher available at the moment. You agree to be sent to a lonely mission to investigate, collect samples and go back. The pay is nice. It's just the moon, nothing can go wrong right?

Controls:

F1Help screen
W,S,A,D
MoveMouseLook
EInteractionQShow number of discovered interactions
F5Toggle fullscreen / windowed
F6 - F7
Increase / decrease pixelation
MToggle music
[ ,  ]
Increase / decrease mouse sensitivity
